Effective April 4, Page will oversee day-to-day operations as well as product development and technology strategy, while Eric Schmidt , bumped up to executive chairman, will by his own account focus on customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership, while Sergey Brin will focus on`` strategic projects, in particular working on new products.''
